items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable data table component for displaying and managing tabular data. Features include sorting, filtering, pagination, and responsive design. Easily integrate into any project and apply custom styling. Available for download via npm for cloud deployment.
items.title: WilliamSilvaOliveiraa/nalu-table-component: A lightweight, customizable data table component for displaying and managing tabular data. Features include sorting, filtering, pagination, and responsive design. Easily integrate into any project and apply custom styling. Available for download via npm for cloud deployment.
